title: Lutheran Service Book
text:
1 Glory be to God the Father,

Glory be to God the Son,

Glory be to God the Spirit:

Great Jehovah, Three in One!

Glory, glory

While eternal ages run!


2 Glory be to Him who loved us,

Washed us from each spot and stain:

Glory be to Him who bought us,

Made us kings with Him to reign!  

Glory, glory 

To the Lamb that once was slain!


3 Glory to the King of angels,

Glory to the Church's King,

Glory to the King of nations;

Heav'n and earth, your praises bring!

Glory, glory 

To the King of glory sing!


4 Glory, blessing, praise eternal!

Thus the choir of angels sings:

Honor, riches, pow'r, dominion!

Thus its praise creation brings.

Glory, glory, 

Glory to the King of kings!

title: Church Hymnary, Fourth Edition
Church Hymnary, Fourth Edition
text:
1 Glory be to God the Father,

glory be to God the Son,

glory be to God the Spirit, --

great Jehovah, Three in One!

Glory, glory, glory, glory

while eternal ages run!


2 Glory be to him who loved us,

washed us from each spot and stain!

Glory be to him who bought us,

made us kings with him to reign!  

Glory, glory, glory, glory

to the Lamb that once was slain!


3 Glory to the King of angels,

glory to the Church's King,

glory to the King of nations!

Heaven and earth, your praises bring;

Glory, glory, glory, glory

to the King of glory sing!


4 Glory, blessing, praise eternal!

Thus the choir of angels sings;

'Honour, riches, power, dominion!'

Thus its praise creation brings;

Glory, glory, glory, glory,

glory to the King of kings!

title: Evangelical Lutheran Hymnary
text:
1 Glory be to God the Father!

Glory be to God the Son!

Glory be to God the Spirit!

God Eternal, Three in One!


2 Glory be to Him who loved us,

Washed us from each spot and stain!

Glory be to Him who bought us,

Made us kings with Him to reign!


3 Glory to the King of angels!

Glory to the Church's King!

Glory to the King of nations!

Heav'n and earth, your praises bring!


4 Glory, blessing, praise eternal!

Thus the choir of angels sings,

Honor, riches, pow'r, dominion!

Thus its praise creation brings.


5 Glory be to God the Father!

Glory be to God the Son!

Glory be to God the Spirit!

God Eternal, Three in One!

title: Worshiping Church, The
text:
1 Glory be to God the Father,

glory be to God the Son,

glory be to God the Spirit:

Great Jehovah, Three in One!

Glory, glory while eternal ages run!


2 Glory be to him who loved us,

washed us from each spot and stain:

glory be to him who bought us,

now with God on high to reign!

Glory, glory to the Lamb that once was slain!


3 Glory to the King of angels,

glory to the church's King,

glory to the King of nations;

heaven and earth, your praises bring!

Glory, glory to the King of glory sing!


4 Glory, blessing, praise eternal!

Thus the choir of angels sings:

honor, riches, power, dominion!

Thus its praise creation brings.

Glory, glory, glory to the King of kings!

title: Sing Joyfully
text:
1 Glory be to God the Father,

Glory be to God the Son,

Glory be to God the Spirit:

Great Jehovah, Three in One!

Glory, glory, glory, glory,

While eternal ages run!


2 Glory be to Him who loved us,

Washed us from each spot and stain:

Glory be to Him who bought us,

Made us kings with Him to reign! 

Glory, glory, glory, glory,

To the Lamb that once was slain!


3 Glory to the King of angels,

Glory to the Church's King,

Glory to the King of nations;

Heav'n and earth, your praises bring!

Glory, glory, glory, glory,

To the King of glory sing!


4 Glory, blessing, praise eternal!

Thus the choir of angels sings:

Honor, riches, pow'r, dominion!

Thus its praise creation brings.

Glory, glory, glory, glory,

Glory to the King of kings!

title: Hymns for the Living Church
text:
1 Glory be to God the Father!

Glory be to God the Son!

Glory be to God the Spirit,

God Eternal, Three in One!


2 Glory be to Him who loved us,

Washed us from each spot and stain!

Glory be to Him who bought us,

Made us kings with Him to reign!


3 Glory to the King of angels!

Glory to the Church's King!

Glory to the King of nations!

Heav'n and earth, your praises bring!


4 Glory, blessing, praise eternal!

Thus the choir of angels sings,

Honor, riches, pow'r, dominion!

thus its praise creation brings.


Amen.

title: The Hymnal, Revised and Enlarged, as adopted by the General Convention of the Protestant Episcopal Church in the United States of America in the year of our Lord 1892
text:
1 Glory be to God the Father!

Glory be to God the Son!

Glory be to God the Spirit!

God Eternal, Three in One!

Glory, glory, Glory, glory,

While eternal ages run!


2 Glory be to Him Who loved us,

Washed us from each spot and stain!

Glory be to Him who bought us,

Made us kings with Him to reign!

Glory, glory, Glory, glory,

To the Lamb that once was slain!


3 Glory to the King of angels!

Glory to the Church's King!

Glory to the King of nations!

Heaven and earth, your praises bring!

Glory, glory, Glory, glory,

To the King of glory bring!


4 Glory, blessing, praise eternal!

Thus the choir of angels sings;

Honor, riches, power, dominion!

thus its praise creation brings;

Glory, glory, Glory, glory,

Glory to the King of kings!
